This document describes the current stable version of Celery (4.3). For development docs, go here.

celery.utils.graph¶

Dependency graph implementation.

class celery.utils.graph.DOT[소스]¶

Constants related to the dot format.

ATTR = '{name}={value}'¶
ATTRSEP = ', '¶
DIRS = {'digraph': '->', 'graph': '--'}¶
EDGE = '{INp}"{0}" {dir} "{1}" [{attrs}]'¶
HEAD = '\n{IN}{type} {id} {{\n{INp}graph [{attrs}]\n'¶
NODE = '{INp}"{0}" [{attrs}]'¶
TAIL = '{IN}}}'¶
exception celery.utils.graph.CycleError[소스]¶

A cycle was detected in an acyclic graph.

class celery.utils.graph.DependencyGraph(it=None, formatter=None)[소스]¶

A directed acyclic graph of objects and their dependencies.

Supports a robust topological sort to detect the order in which they must be handled.

Takes an optional iterator of (obj, dependencies) tuples to build the graph from.

경고

Does not support cycle detection.

add_arc(obj)[소스]¶

Add an object to the graph.

add_edge(A, B)[소스]¶

Add an edge from object A to object B.

I.e. A depends on B.

connect(graph)[소스]¶

Add nodes from another graph.

edges()[소스]¶

Return generator that yields for all edges in the graph.

format(obj)[소스]¶
items()¶
iteritems()¶
repr_node(obj, level=1, fmt='{0}({1})')[소스]¶
to_dot(fh, formatter=None)[소스]¶

Convert the graph to DOT format.

매개 변수:
  • fh (IO) -- A file, or a file-like object to write the graph to.
  • formatter (celery.utils.graph.GraphFormatter) -- Custom graph formatter to use.
topsort()[소스]¶

Sort the graph topologically.

반환:of objects in the order in which they must be handled.
반환 형식:List
update(it)[소스]¶

Update graph with data from a list of (obj, deps) tuples.

valency_of(obj)[소스]¶

Return the valency (degree) of a vertex in the graph.
